name: Princesses Puzzle for Toddlers
description:
Does your toddler love princesses, fairy tales and every kind of peg puzzle and wooden puzzle ?
If your daughter want to play with a lot of princesses you have found the right educational game !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

Princesses Puzzle for Toddlers and little Girls : discover the life of a princess ! is simple and fun :
* Touch the screen to drag and drop the objects in the right spot.
* Pop all the bubbles and play with the reward screen when a puzzle is solved.
* Tap on the jewel to pass to the next level.

18 beautiful puzzles in the unlocked version with colorful princesses: crowns, magic wands, shoes, clothes, necklaces, handbags, rings, the princess carriages, mirrors, castles, jewel and many others!

Funny cartoon sound effects and magic wand sounds !
A stunning collection of enchanted objects with these free puzzles games !
When a puzzle is completed toddlers are rewarded with celebrations and interactions.

Your toddler will have fun with this wooden peg puzzle and beautiful princesses.

If your toddler loves to play with the princess this is the best puzzle game for your child .

Princesses Puzzle for Toddlers and little Girls : discover the life of a princess ! is a must have app for little girls. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-7 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-a lot of fun with bubbles popping after a puzzle is completed
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-high quality illustrations and amazing jewels
-lots of different items
-the best puzzle for toddlers and little kids !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination!

In this free game for toddlers you can unlock all puzzles and remove the advertising in app.

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
